name_original: Kids Apps ∙ 5 Little Monkeys jumping on the bed. Interactive Nursery Rhymes.
description:
The iconic song, "5 Little Monkeys", comes alive on your device! Marvelously fun and educational, 5 Little Monkeys encourages kids' language development, enriches their vocabulary, boosts cognitive pattern recognition and more, all through the popular nursery rhyme.

Experts in literacy and child development have discovered that if children know eight nursery rhymes by heart by the time they’re four years old, they’re usually among the best readers by the time they’re eight. (1)

Designed by the parents of young children, 5 Little Monkeys is a fun, interactive musical counting song that comes to life in an animated, adorable and fun experience. Fun animations and cute characters guide children in learning the foundations for counting and math skills. There are loads of colorful objects for children to interact with and learn about through touch.

5 Little Monkeys even offers original music composed specially for this app.


-- Features --

DYNAMIC LEARNING AT A TOUCH
- Interact with characters and objects in the background
- Designed for young children from 1 year and up

AN ENGAGING AND ORIGINAL AUDIO ADVENTURE
- Professional audio narration
- Original music

BEAUTIFUL ARTISTRY
- High-resolution artwork for each scene

Go bananas with the classic “5 Little Monkeys”!
